VFX_001.name: Dynamic Flux
VFX_001.description: A swarm of sentient particles â€” aware of your presence. As you approach, they shift, respond, and invite you in. Their colors morph from rose to green based on your distance, like an emotional pulse. Itâ€™s not just VFX â€” itâ€™s a reactive entity. A coded organism.
VFX_001.author: Kentiq

VFX_002.name: Tesseract
VFX_002.description: A 3D projection of a 4D hypercube â€” the Tesseract is not just visual. It is a representation of higher-dimensional logic compressed into an artifact. Rotating, folding, evolving in space, it challenges perception and reflects mathematical purity. This is the abstract made real.
VFX_002.author: Kentiq

UXUI_001.name: 2D Kinematics
UXUI_001.description: A highly responsive and dynamic UI element simulating 2D kinematic behavior â€” curves, inertia, momentum and friction are mathematically embedded to deliver a smooth and natural user experience. Ideal for interactive menus, sliders, or visual feedback systems.
UXUI_001.author: Kentiq

SCENE_001.name: Ferrofluid Spiral
SCENE_001.description: An interactive spiral staircase made of black ferrofluid â€” shifting, flowing, and reshaping as you climb. The higher you ascend, the darker and slower it becomes, until it resets in a reverse collapse. Inspired by BayMaxâ€™s black iron robot, this is a living terrain with memory and rhythm.
SCENE_001.author: Kentiq

WEB_001.name: Kentiq's Portfolio Maquette
WEB_001.description: A mockup for Kentiq's personal portfolio website, currently under development.
WEB_001.author: Kentiq

GFX_001.name: Status Effect Concept Icons
GFX_001.description: A set of concept icons for game status effects (Bleeding, Poisoned, Stun, Blind, Berserk, Silence). Inspired by Lost Ark & Black Desert Online UI.
GFX_001.author: Kentiq
